pages.text: Relics are antiquities from the Vault Gods.$(br2)Each $(l)uniquely$() completed Relic set grants $(l)30 additional seconds$() of $(l)time$() within all Vaults.$(br2)Relic Fragments can be obtained from both $(l)Relic Booster Packs$() and $(l)Unidentified Relic Fragments$().

pages.title: Relic Pedestal
pages.text: Once $(l)all$() Relic Fragments are $(l)collected$(), they can be assembled into a $(l)Relic$().$(br2)This is done in a Relic Pedestal, by $(l)selecting$() the correct Relic.
